Oak Ridge High School band
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Four rows of musicians holding their instruments are posing for a portrait on a stage.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Bands; Oak Ridge High School (Tenn.); Schools; Stages (Platforms); Teachers; Teenagers

Adams, Mr.; Adkison, Harry; Bailey, G. W.; Bower, Doc; Brown, Betty; Carodiskey, Bella; Copeland, Phil; Dickens, Laverne; Gabbard, Charles; Gilliland, Martha Lee; Griffith, Dale; Hamrick, Tom; Hensley, Cornelia; Hensley, Rosalee; Hood, Pete; Hurst, Marjorie; Keese, Harvey; Kirk, Gene; Livesay, Bob; Livesay, Harry; McGuffin, June; McGuffin, Mac; Morris, Mary; Phillips, Harold; Russell, Betty; Sawyer, Mr.; Scott, Stanley; Suiter, Bill; Voltz, David; Walden, Bobbie; Webb, Robert
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Some band members have been identified. From left to right, first row; Charles Gabbard, G. W. Bailey, Sawyer, Martha Lee Gilliland, ?, Laverne Dickens, ?, Phil Copeland, Harvey Keese, Mr. Adams (Director). Second row; Robert Webb, Cornelia Hensley, Marjorie Hurst, Mac McGuffin, ?, June McGuffin, Betty Brown, Harry Livesay, Gene Kirk, Bobbie Walden, ?, Mary Morris. Third row; Bella Carodiskey, Betty Russell, ?, ?, Harry Adkison, Harold Phillips, David Voltz, Bill Suiter, ?, Tom Hamrick, Pete Hood, ?, Doc Bower. Top row; Dale Griffith, ?, ?, Rosalee Hensley, Stanley Scott, ?, Bob Livesay
